Pagination

Example
x-model: 
<div x-data="{ model: 1 }" class="flex flex-col">
  <nav x-data="pagination({
        itemsCount: 70,
        maxPages: 7,
        itemsPerPage: 8,
      })" 
      x-model="model"
      class="relative z-0 flex w-auto mt-4 mx-auto"
  >
    <a
      x-bind="prevButton"
      class="flex w-12 cursor-pointer flex-col items-center justify-center rounded border border-gray-300 p-2 text-sm font-medium hover:bg-gray-50 dark:border-neutral-700 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700"
    >
      <svg
        xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
        width="16"
        height="16"
        fill="currentColor"
        class="bi bi-chevron-left"
        viewBox="0 0 16 16"
      >
        <path
          fill-rule="evenodd"
          d="M11.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L5.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
        />
      </svg>
    </a>
    <template x-for="page in getPages">
      <a
        x-bind="pageButton"
        x-text="page"
        class="dark:border-neutral-70 z-10 mx-0.5 flex h-10 w-12 flex-none cursor-pointer items-center justify-center rounded border border-gray-300 text-sm font-semibold transition-shadow hover:bg-gray-50 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700"
        class:selected="ring-2 font-semibold text-white bg-violet-500 hover:bg-violet-400 dark:bg-violet-500 dark:hover:bg-violet-300 border-violet-200 ring-violet-200 dark:text-gray-100 dark:border-violet-500 dark:ring-violet-100"
      >
      </a>
    </template>
    <a
      x-bind="nextButton"
      class="flex w-12 cursor-pointer flex-col items-center justify-center rounded border border-gray-300 p-2 text-sm font-medium hover:bg-gray-50 dark:border-neutral-700 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700"
    >
      <svg
        xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
        width="16"
        height="16"
        fill="currentColor"
        class="bi bi-chevron-right"
        viewBox="0 0 16 16"
      >
        <path
          fill-rule="evenodd"
          d="M4.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L10.293 8 4.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
        />
      </svg>
    </a>
  </nav>
  <div class="font-mono text-lg mx-auto w-max mt-4">
    x-model: <span x-text="model"></span>
  </div>
</div>

Usage

To use this component simply copy and paste minimal template or any template from the examples below.

The data for the component is provided by the pagination function in the x-data directive. This function takes single object as argument.

pagination({
    itemsCount: Number,
    itemsPerPage: Number,
    maxPages: Number,
})
itemsCount
0 Number

Total number of items. Pagination uses this value to compute the number of pages to render. It is usually provided by another component that uses pagination for navigation.

itemsPerPage
10 Number

Number of items per page. Pagination uses this value to compute the number of pages to render. It is usually provided by another component that uses pagination for navigation. 0 disables pagination (displays only 1 page).

maxPages
7 Number

Maximum number of pages to display. This prop must have value of 3 or more.
